package-flags.name: sqlite
package-flags.description: use sqlite. This is just present for consistency, and is not used

package-flags.name: zookeeper
package-flags.description: test only Zookeeper.  default is to test just sqlite.

package-flags.name: mongodb
package-flags.description: test only MongoDB.  default is to test just sqlite.

package-flags.name: postgresql
package-flags.description: test postgresql. default is to test just sqlite.

package-flags.name: mysql
package-flags.description: test MySQL. default is to test just sqlite.

package-flags.name: high_precision_date
package-flags.description: for MongoDB use a time storage with nano second precision.

package-flags.name: nooverlap
package-flags.description: test out our assumption that OverlappingInstances is just for String
